title: Beetroot, bean and rice salad
ingredients: ['2 small beetroots', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g red rice', '600ml water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 small red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '7 radishes, thinly sliced', '2 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Dressing', '2 tablespoons horseradish', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon sugar', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '125ml extra virgin olive oil']
